DC CODE ยง 48-831.11

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Establish simplified procedures for determining eligibility and issuing AccessRx enrollment cards to qualified residents;
Undertake outreach efforts to build public awareness of AccessRx and maximize enrollment of qualified residents; and
Adjust the requirements and terms of AccessRx to accommodate any new federally funded prescription drug program.

chapter.text: Affordability of Prescription Drugs -- AccessRx Program.
